long_description: The Mountainsmith Trekker FX 7075 Monopod/Walking Staff serves double duty as a camera-ready monopod with 3-section height adjustability and a shock absorber to keep your photos in focus. Removable cap in the molded EVA foam handle reveals a 1/4-20 SAE threaded bolt for mounting a camera. The Mountainsmith Trekker FX 7075 Monopod/Walking Staff features a spring-loaded anti-shock system with double cam twist lock-out adjustment. Adjustable webbing wrist strap; removable hiking basket with locking pin; snow basket compatible (snow baskets not included); rubber boot tip; carbide tip.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Trekker FX 7075 Monopod/Walking Staff serves double duty as a camera-ready monopod with 3-section height adjustability and a shock absorber to keep your photos in focus.
